headline: Baird and KayBanc Downgrade Albemarle Corporation (ALB)
summary: Albemarle Corporation (NYSE:ALB) is included in our list of the 9 Cheap Solid State Battery Stocks to Invest in Now. Despite the stock’s recent increase, Albemarle Corporation (NYSE:ALB) was given a double downgrade this week as analysts became more concerned. Citing poor financial health, including a narrow 3.93% gross margin and negative earnings, as well […]
